subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Concussions
Accidents and Safety
Cycling, Road
Vuelta a Espana (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: The Belgian rider Kris Boeckmans was in an induced coma after sustaining a concussion and facial fractures in a crash during the eighth stage of the Vuelta a España.
snippet: The Belgian rider Kris Boeckmans was in an induced coma after sustaining a concussion and facial fractures in a crash during the eighth stage of the Vuelta a España.
